channel.title: Oilfield on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Oilfield on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Aker Solutions Logo
Aker Solutions ASA, an engineering company based in Oslo, provides the products, systems and services required to unlock energy from sources such as oil, gas and offshore wind. The company, founded in 1841, was known as Aker Kværner until 2008. Aker Kværner was founded in 2004 from the major restructuring of a complex “Aker Kværner” business unit, formed originally in 2002 by the merger of Aker Maritime and Kværner Oil & Gas.
You can download theAker Solutionslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Aker Solutions
item.description: Aker Solutions ASA, an engineering company based in Oslo, provides the products, systems and services required to unlock energy from sources such as oil, gas and offshore wind. The company, founded in 1841, was known as Aker Kværner until 2008. Aker Kværner was founded in 2004 from the major restructuring of a complex “Aker Kværner” business unit, formed originally in 2002 by the merger of Aker Maritime and Kværner Oil & Gas.
